import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Chat.css' import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@mui/material' import {AttachFile, InsertEmoticon, MoreVert, SearchOutlined} from '@mui/icons-material' import axios from 'axios' export default function Chat() { const [seed ,setSeed] = useState('') const [input , setInput] = useState('') const sendMessage = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(input); await axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/v1/message/new`,{ }) } useEffect(()=>{ setSeed(Math.floor(Math.random() * 5000)) },[]) return (

React developer

Last Update at {new Date().toString().slice(0,25)}

Mohamed Aflal Hello from Aflal {new Date().toString().slice(0,25)}

Mohamed Apsal Hello from Apsal {new Date().toString().slice(0,20)}

setInput(e.target.value)}/>
) }
